attributes.action: Suspend all MP's pay for failing to deliver the peoples mandate to exit Europe.
attributes.background: Mp's are elected to act in the countries best interest and not their own. They are supposed to deliver the will of the country. The citizens of the UK have voted and given the government and their local MP's a legally binding mandate to exit the European union, not to deliver their personal wish!

rejection.details:
The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: 

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
